'''Quicksand Adventurer (II)''' is an [[achievement]] set in the category ''[[Sumeru: The Gilded Desert - Series II]]''. The achievements are earned by completing Open World [[Time Trial Challenge]]s in the [[Desert of Hadramaveth]].
